content: Quote from: Â  â¥ Futuristic Dice Platform ğŸ² [Neodice Home] & [Discussion Thread]  â¥ List of participants [Spreadsheet]Payment:â¥ This campaign will last at least 4 weeksâ¥ Posts after 23:59 UTC Sunday will be counted towards the following week.â¥ Sr/Hero/Legendary - 0.0001 btc/post (no minimum/max 25 posts).â¥ Full Member - 0.00006 btc/week (no minimum/max 25 posts).Rules:â¥ Posts in local sections will be taken into account.â¥ Post bursting is not allowed, moreover it is easy to check with ninjastic.space.â¥ Posts that do not carry a semantic load or posts whose content is less than 160 characters will not be paid.â¥ I reserve the right to change the rules and disqualify any post and any participant for any reason.â¥ There are a few more obvious things that I haven't mentioned, but which I'll keep a close eye on.â¥ Adding additional lines into your signatures is not allowed, (if this is not your personal referral link).â¥ Excluded boards, (WO & Serious, Sig, Press, Lending & Ex, Auctions, Politics, G/Rounds & Investor Games, Micro Earnings, Off-topic).â¥ You can use your referral link in your signatureApplication:Code:Username:Current post count:BTC SegWit Address:â¥ Don't apply if you have more neg tags than green tags, or if you have an active flag (c)â¥ Do not PM me your application unless you have received a personal invitation.AvatarCode:https://imgur.com/WKgQxMI
